name: Super Mega World - Platform
description:
Super Mega World is easy for all ages to pick up and play, but challenging for the longtime Super Mega fans to master. Unlock the Land of the Livid Dead levels if you have the skills.

GamePlay:
* Collect pieces of keys.
* Casting Key to unlock World.

Features:
* PvP (Person versus Person) Multiplayer online.
* Chat Global.
* Global Leaderboards.
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime.
* Suitable for all age.
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* New levels update every week.

If you have any feedback, please email us at duongthithanh20101989@gmail.com
